attributes.action: Fake .gov sites (passport applications, Car tax, and more)
attributes.additional_details:
This a petition to ban all sites that scam money out of vulnerable people who may not check properly what site they are on due to fake sites resembling the official ones.

The likes of

https://taxdisc-direct.uk.com/
UK-passport.net
Dvla-driving-licence.co.uk
Europeanhealthcard.org.uk/apply-ehic-card-e111.org.uk

There are many many more.

These sites are made to look like official sites and a lot of people are getting caught out.

I call on the government to stop this madness.

These people need to be stopped.
